nodes.title: Deal with more cases of attempting to do something before initialization

IME enter key return char '/r' instead of '/n'
Miscellaneous bugfixes and PATH/shell verification improvements
Behave sanely when selected shell is the empty string or doesn't exist
Add context menus for sending control/fn keys, for the sake of Kindle Fire.
changed back key to send escape to application instead of exiting
Option for selecting part of the text on the screen with two touches
Support swype delete key long press

Fix broken headings in Markdown files
Use ClipData.Item.coerceToText() to be able to paste data from any source

Allow hiding of Material Design ActionBar

check for null value in mActionBar when pressing the back key
A bit of cleanup and refactoring in libtermexec and related native code.
AIDL interface that allows people to forward their terminal output to the app

A grab bag of different improvements
